description:
The "Get team member" endpoint (described below) is deprecated.

We recommend using the [Get team membership](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.19/v3/teams/members/#get-team-membership) endpoint instead. It allows you to get both active and pending memberships.

To list members in a team, the team must be visible to the authenticated user.

204.description: Response if user is a member

404.description: Response if user is not a member

x-changes.note: The path for "Get team member (Legacy)" changed  from "/teams/{team_id}*" to "/orgs/{org}/teams/{team_slug}*"). The operation ID for the old path now has a "-legacy" suffix. The route with the new path has a "-for-org" suffix in the operation ID to avoid breaking changes
